title: Automotive
desc: NVIDIA DRIVE® is an end-to-end platform for the development and deployment of software-defined autonomous vehicles. Spanning from the cloud to the car, NVIDIA’s AI platform enables safer, more efficient transportation at scale.

carousel.title: NVIDIA DRIVE Thor Power the Future of Transportation
carousel.desc: Leading companies across the transportation industry count on NVIDIA DRIVE™ Thor to advance their next-generation vehicles.

carousel.title: NVIDIA Supercharges Autonomous System Development With Omniverse Cloud APIs
carousel.desc: The new APIs deliver large-scale, high-fidelity, and physically based sensor simulations to accelerate autonomous vehicle development.

carousel.title: Automotive on Full Display at GTC
carousel.desc: From EV makers adopting NVIDIA DRIVE Thor to Omniverse Cloud APIs for simulation, learn about the latest automotive announcements at GTC24.

carousel.title: NVIDIA DRIVE Transforms In-Vehicle Experiences
carousel.desc: Learn how generative AI developers are building intelligent AI assistants using NVIDIA’s edge-to-cloud technology.

carousel.title: NVIDIA Automotive Partners Digitalize the Industry
carousel.desc: NVIDIA partners are fusing the physical and digital worlds to redefine the automotive industry.

carousel.title: NVIDIA DRIVE Partners Showcase Innovations in Autonomous Vehicles
carousel.desc: Explore unique perspectives from industry leaders on how AI is shaping the future of transportation.

carousel.title: Automotive Configurator Developers Adopt NVIDIA Omniverse
carousel.desc: WPP, Zerolight, Ford, and Lotus are embracing the interactive 3D platform.

carousel.title: Wave of Automakers Select NVIDIA DRIVE for Automated Driving
carousel.desc: Li Auto, Great Wall Motor, Xiaomi, and ZEEKR adopt the NVIDIA DRIVE platform.

carousel.title: NVIDIA Omniverse Cloud on Microsoft Azure to Accelerate Automotive Digitalization
carousel.desc: Virtual factory and autonomous vehicle simulation engines hosted on Azure will streamline design, production, and validation.

carousel.title: NVIDIA DRIVE Software
carousel.desc: Learn how NVIDIA DRIVE® SDK provides the building blocks for intelligent driving.
